law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 4, effective January 1, 1999. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1986. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1599e-18, 1599e-22.
